response.overview: Zach is devastated by the unexpected death of his girlfriend, Beth. When she mysteriously returns, he gets a second chance at love. Soon his whole world turns upside down...
response.tagline: Boy meets girl. Girl eats boy.
response.title: Life After Beth

results.name: Zach Wants To Know The Truth About Beth's Resurrection
Sundance Film Festival 2014: Life After Beth
Meet The Artists '14: Jeff Baena - Sundance Film Festival
